div.head: 二便頻數
div.div: both [major and minor] relief occur frequently; frequent defecation and urination

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: both [major and minor] relief occur frequently; frequent defecation and urination

sense.def: Illness Sign identical with da xiao bian shuo 大小便數 . Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry kui 葵：今之治 者，惟恐其大小二便頻數，泄其元氣，痘不起發 , “Today’s therapists simply fear its stimulation of frequent defecation and urination [assuming that it] drains the [patient’s] original qi and fails to let the smallpox rise and break out”.
